title: Guide - How To Add Tools to Your Agent in iMash
lede: This guide explains how to add predefined and custom tools to your AI agent in Imash, enabling it to perform actions such as ending calls, booking calendar appointments, or interacting with external services.

steps.title: Create or Select an Agent
steps.content:
1. Navigate to Call Center ‚Üí AI Agents.
  2. Create a new agent or open an existing one.
  3. For this example, select the OpenAI Real-Time model with the Armando voice.

steps.title: Add Predefined Tools
steps.content:
1. Go to the Tools section in the agent configuration.
  2. Click Add Tools.
  3. Select from predefined tools available, such as:
    • End Call Tool: Detects when the conversation is over and ends the call automatically.
    • Calendar Tool: Allows the agent to book appointments directly into the calendar.

steps.title: Test Predefined Tools
steps.content:
1. Go to your Leads list and initiate a test call.
  2. Choose the agent configured with the tools.
  3. During the call, try commands such as:
    • ‚ÄúBook a demo for tomorrow at 1 PM.‚Äù
    • ‚ÄúEnd the call.‚Äù
  4. Verify that the agent successfully books appointments and ends calls.
  5. Check the CRM Calendar to confirm that appointments are created with correct details.

steps.title: Add Custom Tools
steps.content:
1. Go back to the agent configuration screen.
  2. Click Add Tool and select Custom Tool.
  3. Provide a clear and descriptive explanation of the tool‚Äôs purpose (so the AI understands when to use it).
  4. Enter the tool‚Äôs endpoint (e.g., a URL returning JSON or another service endpoint).
  5. Save the configuration.
  6. The agent can now call this endpoint live during conversations to fetch or send information.
